text: Justice Graves may refer to: *Benjamin F. Graves (judge), an Associate Justice of the Michigan Supreme Court *Charles Burleigh Graves, an Associate Justice of the Kansas Supreme Court *James E. Graves Jr., an Associate Justice of the Mississippi Supreme Court *Thomas Graves (Massachusetts judge), an Associate Justice of the Massachusetts Supreme Judicial Court *Waller Washington Graves, an Associate Justice of the Supreme Court of Missouri *William Graves (judge), an Associate Justice of the Kentucky Supreme Court
title: Justice Graves
